views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Migration Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.migrationId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.migrationId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.migrationId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.migrationId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Status Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.statusId,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.statusId], "–"),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedBy], "–")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Started On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn]),
        "–",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.startedOn], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed On",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn]),
        "–",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.completedOn], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "–",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: false
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_DRM_MigrationDetails_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: The table to hold information related to Data Migration requests
